sentences.english: A food fish(Merlangus merlangus) of European Atlantic waters, related to the cod.
sentences.chinese: 魚條的原材料通常使用鱈魚，非常健康。

sentences.english: Drain the fish cutlets , arrange them on the rack.
sentences.chinese: 取出銀鱈魚，排放燒烤架上。

sentences.english: She says fresh pollock is definitely off her restaurant’s menu.
sentences.chinese: 她說，新鮮鱈魚已經從她的餐館菜單裏刪掉了。

sentences.english: Hymenocera elegans here is found in the waters off of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 它們是在印尼附近的海域裏發現的鱈魚的線蟲。

sentences.english: The steamed cod in banana leaf is delicious, and the vegetarian options are plenty. (6433-5126,  www.lostheaven.com.cn/)
sentences.chinese: 蕉葉蒸鱈魚味道鮮美，素食選擇也很多。

sentences.english: Each one holds as many as fifty thousand cod.
sentences.chinese: 每一個擁有多達50萬的鱈魚。

sentences.english: Children go home with cods and trouts.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們提着鱈魚與海鱒回家。

sentences.english: Wash black cod cutlets, pat dry. Sprinkle with seasoning, marinate for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 銀鱈魚洗淨，抹乾，灑入調味，醃約5分鐘。

sentences.english: How about codfish with macaroni and cheese for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚上喫鱈魚加奶酪通心麪怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Inside each of the fifty-meter wide areas are up to fifty thousand cod.
sentences.chinese: 內每五十米寬的地區多達五萬鱈魚。

sentences.english: I'd like a bowl of the cream of mushroom soup, and also the stuffed haddock.
sentences.chinese: 我要一碗奶油蘑菇湯，再來一份填餡鱈魚。

sentences.english: These fish generally have 1,102 amino acids in their AHRs.
sentences.chinese: 這些鱈魚的AHR一般由1102個氨基酸構成。

sentences.english: The cod was salted away for future use.
sentences.chinese: 鱈魚已用鹽醃起留着日後喫。

sentences.english: Bottom trawling can target cod down to 200 meters or so.
sentences.chinese: 拖網作業則可捕到200米甚至更深處的鱈魚。

sentences.english: Both Hudson tomcod and New Bedford killifish, however, have unusual AHR molecules.
sentences.chinese: 哈德遜鱈魚和新貝爾福德鱂魚都擁有特殊的AHR。

sentences.english: The cod (fish) can be replaced with trout or turbot.
sentences.chinese: 鱈魚可以用鮭魚或者大菱鮃代替。

definition: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
